T02D2170:321a-1: ma h'a ya ksha se na pa ti n'i l'am
T02D2170:321a-2: ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni s'a dha nam
T02D2170:321a-4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D2170:321a-5: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2170:321a-6: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud dag la //
T02D2170:321a-7: brten nas nang gi sgrub thabs 'di //
T02D2170:321a-8: bdag gis dran phyir bshad par bya //
T02D2170:321a-9: lha yi rnal 'byor yud tsam bsam ;
T02D2170:321a-10: / rang gi snying gar zla dkyil bsam //
T02D2170:321a-11: de yi steng du h'um yig bsam //
T02D2170:321a-14: bla ma dang ni gos sngon can //
T02D2170:321a-15: dkon mchog la sogs spyan drangs nas //
T02D2170:321a-16: phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang //
T02D2170:321b-0: rjes su @321b yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba gdab //
T02D2170:321b-1: skyabs gsol lus dbul dge rtsa bsngo //
T02D2170:321b-2: tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya //
T02D2170:321b-3: de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms //
T02D2170:321b-4: de la 'od phung tshul du bdag rang nyid //
T02D2170:321b-5: de yi nang na h'um gnas la //
T02D2170:321b-7: lte bar nyid bsams h'um de nyid //
T02D2170:321b-8: de las gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur //
T02D2170:321b-10: khro bo chen po bcu ru gyur //
T02D2170:321b-11: h'um bzhi'i gsang sngags brjod pa yis //
T02D2170:321b-12: khro bcu'i sprul pas gdug pa bkug //
T02D2170:321b-13: sku gsung thugs kyi phur bus gdab //
T02D2170:321b-14: btul zhing sbyangs nas nam mkhar gyur //
T02D2170:321b-16: rdo rje gur dang rab dang //
T02D2170:321b-17: dra ba nyid du gyur pa'o //
T02D2170:321b-19: stong pa nyid las 'od spung byung //
T02D2170:321b-20: de las nyi zla kha sbyar gyur //
T02D2170:321b-21: a'a li k'a lis nyi zla brgyan //
T02D2170:321b-22: dbus su aa dang h'um sbyar te //
T02D2170:321b-23: kha dog dkar dmar nyid du blta //
T02D2170:321b-25: / zhu bas rdo rje padmar gyur //
T02D2170:321b-26: pad steng rdo rje rkang nub tsam //
T02D2170:321b-27: lte ba gnyis la snying pos bskor //
T02D2170:321b-28: de gnyis las ni thugs dang gsung //
T02D2170:321b-29: gnyi gas sku bsdus phyin gyis brlab //
T02D2170:321b-30: de nyid 'od du zhu ba las //
T02D2170:321b-31: rdo rje las ni khro bor gyur //
T02D2170:321b-32: padma las ni khro mor gyur //
T02D2170:321b-33: khro bo rdo rje gos sngon can//
T02D2170:321b-34: sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa //
T02D2170:321b-35: phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
T02D2170:321b-36: mche ba gtsigs pas 'dod dgur gyur //
T02D2170:321b-37: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'khril ba'i tshul //
T02D2170:321b-38: g-yon du rdo rje khro mo ni //
T02D2170:321b-39: sku mdog ljang dmar zhal gcig ma //
T02D2170:321b-40: phyag g-yas rdo rje gri gug gtso la 'khyud //
T02D2170:321b-41: g-yon pa bha na dmar gtso la stob //
T02D2170:321b-42: gnyis med 'khril pa'i tshul bsgoms nas //
T02D2170:321b-43: ye shes sems dpa'i spyan drangs te //
T02D2170:321b-44: phyi nang bdud rtsi mchod nas bstim //
T02D2170:321b-46: de bzhin khro chung lus byin brlab //
T02D2170:321b-47: dbang bskur bas ni mi bskyod 'gyur //
T02D2170:321b-48: de ltar bsgoms nas bzlas pa bya //
T02D2170:321b-49: de steng ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02D2170:321b-50: mtshan ma la sogs bsgoms nas su //
T02D2170:321b-53: ma gsal bar du bsgom par bya //
T02D2170:321b-54: de ltar rab 'bring tha ma yis //
T02D2170:322a-2: the tshom med na dngos grub 'grub //
T02D2170:322a-3: dam tshig nyams sam sdig che bas //
T02D2170:322a-4: sbyin sreg la sogs mang du bya //
T02D2170:322a-5: mtshan ma gsum ma ma nus pa brtag //
T02D2170:322a-6: de ltar byung na sgrub pa brtsam //
T02D2170:322a-7: ston du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2170:322a-8: sgrub pa'i rim pa bstan pa ni //
T02D2170:322a-10: dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag por bya //
T02D2170:322a-11: rdo rje gri gug nang du ste //
T02D2170:322a-12: bar du me ri gtang bar bya //
T02D2170:322a-13: gzhu dang dgra sta mdung dang gsum //
T02D2170:322a-14: me ri'i zur nas gtang bar bya //
T02D2170:322a-15: tshub ma dur khrod sol ba dang //
T02D2170:322a-16: bdud rtsi bag zan gzugs brnyan bya //
T02D2170:322a-17: snying gar gru gsum gzugs brnyan gzhug / kha bcad seng ldeng phur la btod //
T02D2170:322a-18: mtshan ldan ka p'a la ru ni //
T02D2170:322a-19: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lngas dgang //
T02D2170:322a-20: de ni gos sngon nyid la mchod //
T02D2170:322a-21: lcags kyi gru gsum nang du ni //
T02D2170:322a-22: bdud rtsi sha lnga khrag gsum dgang //
T02D2170:322a-23: de ni nag po'i gtor gta'o //
T02D2170:322a-24: rnel gre'i snod du dug gtor bsags //
T02D2170:322a-25: phye ma gsum dang yungs kar gdab //
T02D2170:322a-26: slob dpon slob ma gnyis ka yang //
T02D2170:322a-27: gos sngon gos nag rgyan cha bgo //
T02D2170:322a-28: raksha rus pa'i phreng ba bgrang //
T02D2170:322a-29: nub dang lho ru kha bltas te //
T02D2170:322a-30: bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin bsgom //
T02D2170:322a-31: thun mong sngags dang khyad par sngags //
T02D2170:322a-33: bzlas pas gsang ba'i rim pa brtsam //
T02D2170:322a-34: snying ga'i mtshan ma la sogs gsal //
T02D2170:322a-35: lce ni h'um gi rdo rjer bsgyur //
T02D2170:322a-37: de la khro tshogs byung bas dgug / yang na mgon po bskul pas bsam //
T02D2170:322a-38: khri yi bar du bzlas nas ni //
T02D2170:322a-39: thun bar du ni phye ma gsum //
T02D2170:322a-40: mgon pos las kyi gtor mar gdab //
T02D2170:322a-41: yungs kar gos sngon can gyis so //
T02D2170:322a-42: phye ma dug nag 'od zer dgang //
T02D2170:322a-43: yungs kar khro chung nyid du spro //
T02D2170:322a-44: rtags byung nas ni gzugs brnyan gzhug / de nas sgrub khang them rtsa ru//
T02D2170:322a-45: gru gsum nag po'i brub khung du //
T02D2170:322a-46: de nyid bcug la kha bcad ri rab bri //
T02D2170:322a-47: de steng mnan zhing stang stabs bya //
T02D2170:322a-48: de ni mnan pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D2170:322a-49: phur bus gdab cing gri gug gtub //
T02D2170:322a-50: de nas gru gsum gtor mar dbul //
T02D2170:322a-51: nag po chen po nyid la bstabs //
T02D2170:322b-0: drag sngags bzlas pa'i gtor @322b ma yi ;
T02D2170:322b-1: / gsang ba'i man ngag shes par bya'o //
T02D2170:322b-2: yang na sbyin sreg nyid kyis bya //
T02D2170:322b-3: de rnams gsad pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D2170:322b-5: lte bar gtso bo bskyed nas ni //
T02D2170:322b-6: klu chen brgyad po 'dab mar bskyed //
T02D2170:322b-7: rin chen snod du gtor ma bsham //
T02D2170:322b-8: chu gtsang sman la sogs pa dang ;
T02D2170:322b-9: / khyad par klu sman sna tshogs dang //
T02D2170:322b-10: dkar gsum mngar gsum rnams kyis bya //
T02D2170:322b-11: sbyang zhing ba yin gyis brlab sogs bya //
T02D2170:322b-12: klu la byin pas zhe sdang zhi //
T02D2170:322b-13: lhag ma 'khor lo byin pa yis //
T02D2170:322b-14: gnod pa rnams ni zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D2170:322b-15: sngags bzlas 'od zer phog pa yis //
T02D2170:322b-16: gtso bo'i dam tshig rjes dran pas //
T02D2170:322b-18: yang na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2170:322b-19: bskrad dang bcing dang dgug pa yis //
T02D2170:322b-20: de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni //
T02D2170:322b-21: sbyor ka chen por shes par bya //
T02D2170:322b-22: 'khor lo ser po'i lte bar gtso //
T02D2170:322b-23: mdun du rgyal po bskyed par bya //
T02D2170:322b-24: de yi g-yas su nor lha ni //
T02D2170:322b-25: sku mdog dkar po 'dzum bag can //
T02D2170:322b-26: nor bu'i sgrom ni g-yas g-yon bsnams //
T02D2170:322b-27: mchod cing bstod pa gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D2170:322b-28: gzugs brnyan 'di la rin chen brten //
T02D2170:322b-29: kha dog lnga dang gser gyis mtshon //
T02D2170:322b-30: kha dog ser po'i bzlas thems nas ;
T02D2170:322b-31: / ci 'dod pa yi nor rnams ster //
T02D2170:322b-32: de ni thun mong dngos grub bo //
T02D2170:322b-33: bdud rtsi rtsa ba lnga btsal la //
T02D2170:322b-34: bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya //
T02D2170:322b-35: dkar gsum mngar gsum nyid la ni //
T02D2170:322b-36: sngags bzlas ri lu byas te bza' //
T02D2170:322b-37: zas dang sman ni srang la brje //
T02D2170:322b-39: de gsum skye ba bdun pa dang //
T02D2170:322b-40: yul gyi cha bsres sman rnams sbyar //
T02D2170:322b-41: de sgrub 'od zer btul zhing sbyang //
T02D2170:322b-42: rtags byung nas ni bza' zhing byug //
T02D2170:322b-43: de yis thun mong dngos grub 'grub //
T02D2170:322b-44: mchog gi yang ni grogs su 'gyur //
T02D2170:322b-45: mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa yang //
T02D2170:322b-46: thugs ka yi ni dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2170:322b-47: rtsa rgyud 'dab ma brgyad du bsam //
T02D2170:322b-48: de dkyil rtsa ni rta nga'i tshad //
T02D2170:322b-49: de yi nang du dbugs kyi lha //
T02D2170:322b-50: kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2170:322b-51: de dkyil thig le byang chub sems //
T02D2170:322b-52: de la lta zhing bsgom pa ni //
T02D2170:323a-0: rtags lnga'i mthar ni stong nyid @323a * //
T02D2170:323a-2: / de nyid spro zhing bsdu ba dang //
T02D2170:323a-3: dgug cing bskyil ba'i rim pa'am //
T02D2170:323a-4: mnan cing bzlog pa'i man ngag gis //
T02D2170:323a-5: rim gyis ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2170:323a-6: de nas phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob //
T02D2170:323a-7: nang sgrub rim pa 'di yis ni //
T02D2170:323a-8: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can dang //
T02D2170:323a-10: bla med byang chub thob par shog / gnod sbyin
T02D2170:323a-11: gyi de dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje gos
T02D2170:323a-12: sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs /
